reviewText:
Its good quality homemade video footage of 3 woman who were trying to get to be playboy bunnies, probably shot by their boyfriends, apparently you can send footage to playboy and maybe get an audition to be a bunny, my guess is that all rights to the footage or video becomes property of playboy and they can make a retail video of the footage and make money on it.
  Each woman has about 15 minutes, chopped into about three 5 minute nude clips, with an additional few minutes telling where she is from etc. There's the girl with the boyfriend with the expensive car and home routine, the girl on the ranch routine, and the girl with the shaved pussy routine,
  The 1st two girls are pretty boring, non-plussed and mainly expressionless, they do posing routines mostly, posing nude on a car, jumping nude on a trampoline, posing nude playing pool. These routines are boring for other reasons, its basically just bush and boobs, too much forest and not enough trees.
  The third one is definitely more sexy, more like penthouse, no forest to block the view of the trees, she seems like a very happy camper, 2 of her clips are good sexy routines with acceptable background (kitchen and bedroom), probably worth the $10 for the dvd; the 3rd clip is sexy too if you can ignore the background (she or the cameraman did not clean the grout of the shower/tub, plenty of views of mildew growing on every seam).
  So if you like bush and boobs posing or sexy shaved routines this dvd might be for you (FYI probably the last thing you're looking at is the shower wall grout on the shower routine but I mention it because some peeps are super compulsive about those sorts of things, although the shower routine would have been better sans mildew)

I actually ordered, "Playboy: Hottest Housewives/Exposed Naughty Wives Party (2006)"  not this title.  Please see my review of "Naughty houswives and find out more about the hottest, unutilized talent from playboy, Lara Lasher.
this is a good DVD.  it does have lots of nudity, so if you are prude, then this is probably not for you.  I like this DVD for me.

We bought this video thinking it was like the serious on playboy channel. Its not! Its just a bunch of stupid home audition videos that shows hardly anything if ur lucky. The series is actually Adult video this is just a tease with all women in it.
